```{r}
library (VSURF)

library (rpart)
library("dplyr")
library(MASS)
library ('glmnet')
library(leaps)

library (tidyr)
library(tidyverse)

library(lubridate)
```


```{r}
#Load data and remove corrupt values
Cancer <- read.csv('/Users/hazemeseifan/ASML/cancer_reg.csv')
CancerC <-Cancer [!(Cancer$medianage > 100),]
CancerC <-CancerC [!(CancerC$avganncount > 1962 & CancerC$avganncount < 1963),]
Cancer2 = CancerC %>%
  separate(geography, c("county", "state"), ", ")
Cancer_m = Cancer2 [, -c( 9, 13, 18, 25)]

Cancer_m = na.omit (Cancer_m)
Cancer_m
```



```{r}
set.seed(3101318)
 M_VS_thres = VSURF_thres (x = Cancer_m [,-3], y = Cancer_m[,3], mtry = 3)

```



```{r}
M_VS_interp <- VSURF_interp (x = Cancer_m [,-3], y = Cancer_m[,3], vars = M_VS_thres$varselect.thres)

```


```{r}
M_VS_interp$varselect.interp
```
```{r}
Cancer_m

```


```{r}
#Before we train our CART model, we'll split the set in train and test sets:
u = 1:nrow (Cancer_m)
m= floor (3/4*nrow (Cancer_m))
v =sample (u,m)
Cancer_tr = Cancer_m [v,]
Cancer_ts = Cancer_m [-v,]
Cancer_tr
Cancer_ts
```


```{r}
#Construct maximal tree:

Tmax=rpart (target_deathrate~
              incidencerate + 
              pctbachdeg25_over +
              pcths25_over+
              avgdeathsperyear+
              medincome+
              povertypercent+
              pctpubliccoveragealone+
              pctprivatecoverage+
              pctblack+
              pctotherrace+
              pctemployed16_over+
              pctpubliccoverage+
              popest2015+
              avganncount, 
data=Cancer_tr, control = rpart.control (cp= 10^(-15), minsplit = 2))
Tmax
```
```{r}
plotcp (Tmax)
```

```{r}
#Check error for max tree
Pmax=predict (Tmax)
err2=sum ( (Pmax-Cancer_tr$target_deathrate) ^2)/length (Pmax)
err2
```


```{r}
#Smallest cross-validation error:
CP = Tmax$cptable
cvmin = min (CP [,4])
cvmin
r= which (CP[, 4]==cvmin)
t= CP [r, 4]+CP [r, 5] #the 1se rule threshold
Z = which (CP [,4]<= t) #CP values below the threshold
Z
ZS = Z [1] #Pick the first one
ZS

```

```{r}
#Use the CP value we picked to create a pruned tree
Tfinal = prune (Tmax, cp= CP [ZS,1])
Tfinal
```

```{r}
plot (Tfinal)
text (Tfinal)
```

```{r}
M_AIC= lm (target_deathrate ~ avganncount + avgdeathsperyear + incidencerate + 
    medincome + popest2015 + povertypercent + medianagemale + 
    percentmarried + pctnohs18_24 + pcths18_24 + pcths25_over + 
    pctbachdeg25_over + pctemployed16_over + pctprivatecoverage + 
    pctempprivcoverage + pctwhite + pctasian + pctotherrace + 
    pctmarriedhouseholds + birthrate, data = Cancer_tr)
summary(M_AIC)
```


```{r}
MR2 = lm (target_deathrate~
avganncount+
avgdeathsperyear+
incidencerate+
medincome+
popest2015+
povertypercent+
medianagemale+
percentmarried+
pctnohs18_24+          
pcths18_24+ 
pcths25_over+
pctbachdeg25_over+
pctemployed16_over+
pctprivatecoverage+
pctempprivcoverage+    
pctpubliccoverage+
pctpubliccoveragealone+
pctwhite+
pctasian+
pctotherrace+
pctmarriedhouseholds+
birthrate, 
data = Cancer_tr)
summary (MR2)
```

```{r}
M_Lasso = lm (target_deathrate ~  
avganncount            +
avgdeathsperyear       +
incidencerate          +
medincome              +
povertypercent         +
medianagemale          +
medianagefemale        +
percentmarried         +
pctnohs18_24           +
pcths18_24             +
pcths25_over           +
pctbachdeg25_over      +
pctemployed16_over     +
pctunemployed16_over   +
pctprivatecoverage     +
pctempprivcoverage     +
pctpubliccoveragealone +
pctwhite               +
pctblack               +
pctotherrace           +
pctmarriedhouseholds   +
birthrate              ,
data= Cancer_tr)

summary (M_Lasso)
```

```{r}
Pred_tr = predict (Tfinal, newdata = Cancer_ts)
Pred_AIC = predict (M_AIC, newdata = Cancer_ts)
Pred_R2 = predict(MR2, newdata = Cancer_ts)
Pred_Lasso  =  predict(Tfinal, newdata = Cancer_ts)
```


```{r}
error_tr = 1/length(Pred_tr)*sum ((Cancer_ts$target_deathrate-Pred_tr)^2)
error_AIC = 1/length(Pred_AIC)*sum ((Cancer_ts$target_deathrate-Pred_AIC)^2)
error_R2 = 1/length(Pred_R2)*sum ((Cancer_ts$target_deathrate-Pred_R2)^2)
error_Lasso = 1/length(Pred_Lasso)*sum ((Cancer_ts$target_deathrate-Pred_Lasso)^2)

```


```{r}
sqrt (error_tr)
sqrt (error_AIC)
sqrt (error_R2)
sqrt (error_Lasso)
```
